channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Moscow plans to use seized US-owned company to feed Russian army, document shows

Memo shows U.S. can send migrants with no criminal record to Guantanamo
item.description: A government memo obtained by CBS News shows the Trump administration created broad rules outlining which migrants can be held at Guantanamo Bay​.

item.title: Former OneRepublic bassist to take on veteran California GOP House member
item.description: Democrats are hoping pop rock star power will help oust a long-serving Republican east of Los Angeles in the fight for the U.S. House

item.title: Police dig up underground shooting range, guns buried in field
item.description: Neighbors could not hear guns going off because of the depth of the range, police said.

item.title: 3/13: CBS Morning News
item.description: Deadline to pass short-term bill to avoid government shutdown approaches; Astronauts' homecoming delayed again.

item.title: Tennessee’s GOP leads the fight to deny public education to children without documents
152 dogs rescued from 'extremely poor' conditions in Utah
item.description: Authorities have rescued a total of 152 dogs living in “extremely poor” conditions from a house in Utah, officials said.

How war, money and the quest for discovery entwined the US government and universities
item.description: The showdown between the Trump administration and Harvard University is spotlighting bare-knuckled politics and big dollar figures.
